learning_objective: Describe how internal and external parts of computing devices function to form a system.
topic: Self-Assessment: Identifying Interests, Skills, and Values
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has always been interested in art and design. They recently won a poster design contest and consider starting to pursue a career in graphic design. They enjoy using a tablet illustrate their designs, but currently they are using a normal laptop. Which internal parts upgrade will enhance Alex's graphic design workflow?",
    "Answer1": "Installing a new graphics card",
    "Answer2": "Increasing the hard disk storage",
    "Answer3": "Upgrading to a faster processor",
    "Answer4": "All of the above",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "For graphic design, all three options would enhance Alex's workflow. A new graphics card would help render images and designs faster, more hard disk storage would allow Alex to store larger design files, and a faster processor would speed up overall performance."
}
